course_description: In DM750, students bring their final project to completion by engaging in a process of evaluation and interaction with their project consultants, the DMin Director, and their cohort of peers. The project culminates in the final on-campus experience, the Festival of Learning, in which students make formal, public presentations of their projects.
sections: Class Nbr: 5434, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: W 3:30-5p, Instructor: R. Nam, Status: Open
